title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You may believe the squeaky wheel always getting the grease is unfair to those who keep their mouths shut and their hands busy. Deciding whether someones loud complaints merit your attention may leave you feeling uneasy today. Perhaps you dont want to be caught up in the drama of their dissatisfaction. But youre probably right to sense that their noise could be concealing a quieter truth they dont wish to hear. Avoid trying to match their volume and emotionalism. Instead, deliver the news plainly and directly so they can receive it. Composer John Buckley wrote, If you really want to be understood, say things simply. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
